long_description: Discreet, soft and lightweight, the Pacsafe RFIDsafe 100 travel waist wallet keeps your passport, credit cards and bank cards within easy reach while protecting sensitive personal information. Designed to be worn underneath clothing. State-of-the-art material helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. Pacsafe RFIDsafe100 waist wallet features moisture-resistant lining and a comfortable, breathable backing with anti-odor treatment. 2 zippered compartments and 1 card slot.
short_description: Discreet, soft and lightweight, the Pacsafe RFIDsafe 100 travel waist wallet keeps your passport, credit cards and bank cards within easy reach while protecting sensitive personal information.
